name: Cilan
rules: Search your deck for 3 basic Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Exp. Share
rules: When your Active Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack, you may move 1 basic Energy card that was attached to that Pokémon to the Pokémon this card is attached to.

name: Heavy Ball
rules: Search your deck for a Pokémon with a Retreat Cost of 3 or more, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Level Ball
rules: Search your deck for a Pokémon with 90 HP or less, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Pokémon Center
rules: Once during each player's turn, that player may heal 20 damage from 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Skyarrow Bridge
rules: The Retreat Cost of each Basic Pokémon in play is Colorless less.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Double Colorless Energy
rules: Double Colorless Energy provides ColorlessColorless Energy.

name: Prism Energy
rules: This card provides Colorless Energy. If the Pokémon this card is attached to is a Basic Pokémon, this card provides every type of Energy but provides only 1 Energy at a time.
